, I'm impressed by how much you improve every time I see you. Our enemy grow stronger too, though. We must do all we can to stay ahead of them.

To that end, I have a gift for you. It's a skill glyph, the kind top soldiers use to improve their skills.

Phidias, one of our warrior glyphmasters, will give it to you and explain how you use it.

Seir promised you a glyph, did he? I love how he hands them out. He knows they're valuable, but so help me, he's worthless at explaing why! Ha!

Glyphs reinforce or modify your skills. You learn them simply by clicking on them in your inventory, but you activate them from your skills list.

You gain glyph points as you progress in level and experience, and these glyph points help activate your glyphs."I see."

If you activate the wrong glyph by mistake, just reset your glyph points. It will cost money, yes, but we pay for our mistakes, eh?

Here's your glyph. Put it to good use. Thanks for stopping by! I like meeting our veterans!
